ygData.subject: Re: Greets
ygData.msgSnippet: Crystalline sword is a ranger only weapon I believe. Griffin claws are Monk weapons.  Adds damage while still using the martial art attacks.
ygData.messageBody:
Crystalline sword is a ranger only weapon I believe.

Griffin claws are Monk weapons. Adds damage while still using the martial
art attacks.
